title: Use the Sea Breeze
description: Balbriggan's coastal air prevents mildew - perfect for tomatoes!

title: Winter is Mild
description: Our coastal protection means you can grow kale & spinach all winter!

title: Saturday Market Magic
description: Swap plants & get advice at Balbriggan Farmers Market every week!

title: Beach Compost
description: Seaweed from our beaches makes incredible fertilizer!

title: Wind Protection
description: Use hedges to create microclimates in your garden.

title: Community Garden
description: Join the Town Park community garden - tools, seeds, and experts provided!
